about:
üë®‚Äçüíª **About Abhishek Mehta:**

Abhishek is a dedicated software engineer with a strong foundation in backend and full-stack engineering, focused on building scalable, reliable, and high-performance production-ready systems.

**Professional Background:**
‚Ä¢ Master's in Computer Applications (2024) from Chandigarh University
‚Ä¢ Currently working as MERN Stack / Backend Developer
‚Ä¢ Day-to-day work: backend architecture, API design, authentication flows, payment systems, and end-to-end feature delivery

**Engineering Approach:**
‚Ä¢ Systems architecture and design
‚Ä¢ Production-grade backend systems
‚Ä¢ Scalability and reliability focus
‚Ä¢ Real-world system behavior (under load, over time, at scale)
‚Ä¢ Deep thinking about how software behaves in production environments

**Current Focus:**
‚Ä¢ Implementing AI workflows and agent-based systems
‚Ä¢ RAG pipelines and backend-driven AI orchestration
‚Ä¢ Cloud-native engineering and DevOps automation
‚Ä¢ Distributed systems and applied AI
‚Ä¢ Becoming a complete end-to-end engineer

**Core Competencies:**
‚Ä¢ Production APIs used in real products
‚Ä¢ Secure, maintainable system design
‚Ä¢ Infrastructure: DevOps, containerization, CI/CD
‚Ä¢ AI Integration: RAG systems, agent workflows, tool-calling
‚Ä¢ Thinking in terms of systems, not just features

**Engineering Philosophy:**
‚Ä¢ Production > demos
‚Ä¢ Systems > scripts
‚Ä¢ Reliability > shortcuts
‚Ä¢ Learning by building real things
‚Ä¢ Deep ownership and engineering excellence

**Vision:**
To work with teams that value deep thinking, ownership, and engineering excellence, contributing to products that solve real problems and building meaningful systems that scale.
